name: Churchill Roman
description: If you want to know about me, first of Churchill Roman is my facebook name, kindly make no excitation to add me on facebook and please read my profile completely. I’m Churchill By name; I am an American God fearing man who wants to seek love and serious relationship here. I’m a hardworking professional petroleum marketer who does business and travel around the world. I have a bachelor degree in Economics and have Psychological counseling qualification. I was married and also had one daughters who are 3 years plus. My life was scattered after I lost my late wife, now I want to change my life. I’m looking for a woman who can be my love, soul mate and life partner, marry me, build a happy family with me, and spend the rest of life together with me. Ever since my wife the mother of my daughter died life has been nothing to me, I want a woman who can make me feel love once again. The family I mean not only two of us but also including kids from each of us, even parents. I love big family and I’m willing to devote myself for my family.
